info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Greene and northeastern Craighead Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crowleys Ridge State Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Lake City, Brookland, Monette, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Walcott, Poplar Ridge, Macey, Schug, Southland, Stanford, Lester, Bethel, Finch, Lorado, Goobertown and Crowley`s Ridge State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
